summary: Adds wedding rings that take up the ring finger on the left hand.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve never liked how rings are worn in Skyrim, and while I saw some left hand ring mods, I didn\'t see any that add rings to the left hand ring finger. I decided to take the initiative and do it myself, though my work isn\'t the greatest. This is a quick and dirty mod, but it works well enough for me. 

You can purchase three of the rings, a gold diamond engagement ring, a silver wedding ring and a gold wedding ring, from Radiant Raiment in Solitude. I changed the bond of matrimony ring to the left hand as well.

Compatibilities
I\'ve uploaded four versions of this mod. Each version makes the rings take up a different slot, so if you find that my mod isn\'t compatible with another mod you\'re using because they both take up the same equipment slot, try using an alternative version of my mod. 
I recommend the slot 55 version as slot 55 is what is recommend for extra jewelry; however, there are other mods that use this slot, so you might be best using another version. 
Please let me know if any issues arise. I will try my best to reply and fix any errors as quickly as possible. 

The first person fix .esp affects all vanilla races as well as their vampire counterparts. You may run into issues using and mod affecting vampires or the vanilla races. If any issues occur as a result of using the first person fix, try loading the .esp before your race mod. If that doesn\'t fix any issues/causes other issues, you might need to disable my first person fix and edit the race mod you\'re using instead of using my .esp. 

If you like my work, please endorse. 

If you want the rings to work in first person, this guide should help.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/185764 
Check which version of my mod you\'re using before you go and edit a race. Backup any .esp before you edit it.
author: Ezuka
